txt_en: Labor is the most reliable wealth.
txt_cn: 劳动是最可靠的财富。

txt_en: Sweat is the lubricant of success.
txt_cn: 汗水是成功的润滑剂。

txt_en: Do your thing and don't care if they like it.
txt_cn: 做你的事，别在意别人是否喜欢。

txt_en: Just hold to your dream and never give up.
txt_cn: 坚持你的梦想，永不放弃。

txt_en: Plan something big by starting with small steps.
txt_cn: 从小处着手，规划大事。

txt_en: Creating light for others naturally lights our own way.
txt_cn: 为他人创造光明自然照亮我们之路。

txt_en: A dead end is just a good place to turn around.
txt_cn: 死胡同只是一个很好的转弯之处。

txt_en: I’ve nothing to do today but smile.
txt_cn: 你今天唯一能做的事就是微笑。

txt_en: You can, you should, and if you’re brave, you will.
txt_cn: 你可以，你应该，若你勇敢，你会做到。

txt_en: There is always a better way.
txt_cn: 总有更好的办法。

txt_en: Life is too short for us to wake up in the morning with regrets.
txt_cn: 人生苦短，所以每天不要带着遗憾醒来。

txt_en: Life is like riding a bicycle, you must keep moving.
txt_cn: 生活像骑自行车，必须不断前进。

txt_en: Destination is never a place, but a new perspective.
txt_cn: 目的地不是地方，而是一种新视角。

txt_en: Some look for a beautiful place, others make it beautiful.
txt_cn: 有人寻找美丽之地，有人创造美丽之地。

txt_en: How you deal with failure determines your success.
txt_cn: 你如何处理失败决定你的成功。

txt_en: I’ve found 10,000 ways that won’t work.
txt_cn: 我找到了10,000种行不通的方法。

txt_en: Death is just a part of life, something we’re all destined to do.
txt_cn: 死亡是生命的一部分，是我们注定要面对的一件事。

txt_en: There are only the pursued, the pursuing, the busy and the tired.
txt_cn: 世界上只有被追求者和追求者，忙碌者和疲惫者。

txt_en: Time flies, but you’re the pilot of your life.
txt_cn: 时间飞逝，但你是人生的飞行员。

txt_en: You make a life out of what you have.
txt_cn: 你用拥有的东西创造生活。

txt_en: There are years that ask questions and years that answer.
txt_cn: 有提问的年份，也有回答的年份。

txt_en: Decide what to do with the time given to us.
txt_cn: 决定如何使用给予我们的时间。

txt_en: Each of us is more than our worst mistake.
txt_cn: 我们每个人都超越了自己最糟的错误。

txt_en: Look before you leap.
txt_cn: 三思而后行。

txt_en: Rome was not built in a day.
txt_cn: 罗马不是一天造成的。

txt_en: Wishing takes as much energy as planning does.
txt_cn: 许愿和计划需要同样的能量。

txt_en: You cannot change what you are, only what you do.
txt_cn: 你无法改变本质，只能改变行为。

txt_en: A good mind is not enough; use it well.
txt_cn: 好头脑不够，必须善加利用。
